title: One Day That Changed My Life
overview: Each of us will have experienced a day that changed the course of our lives - dramatic moments that can send lives in one of any two directions.In this series, we will be capturing those extraordinary moments. From medical results to business decisions, creating a family to saving communities, those crossroads moments when everything changes. With four stories in each episode, we show the run up to real life results moments, culminating on one day that's delivers intimate decisions that reflect the audiences lives back to them.
